Having lived in 5 countries I am in a safe position to say that Britain is the worst place for driving offenses I have seen, in particularly Wales where I constantly fear for my life of being hit by idiots.

Children, families and individuals are being killed by idiotic driving. Knowing that penalties for driving offences are soft so why should they keep within speed limits, not cut people up or not ride your backside?

It's about time we sent out a hard message to say enough is enough. Toughen up the laws for driving offences.
